Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson is out for the back-to-back game against Portland due to return to competition reconditioning.
Trey Murphy (ankle) and Brandon Ingram (left ankle sprain) are also sidelined for the matchup.
Dejounte Murray is questionable for the Pelicans due to right elbow soreness and right shin contusion.
For Portland, Jerami Grant (face contusion) and Matisse Thybulle (right ankle) are out.
Deni Avdija (right wrist sprain) and Donovan Clingan (rest) are questionable for the Trail Blazers.
The Pelicans and Trail Blazers have a history of close matchups, with the most recent game being a Portland victory on January 8.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for 7 p.m. CT at the Smoothie King Center.
The game will be broadcast on GCSN on TV and WWL on radio.
